Title: Darkness
Plot: Lupo and Green's first offical case together is a kidnapping that happened during a citywide blackout; a housekeeper is slain and a mother and daughter are kidnapped. The evidence that links all the kidnappers is the father and husband of the kidnap victims. When they search the kidnappers' hideout, they find preparations which implies that the kidnappers knew that the blackout was coming. Cutter must convince the man to testify after he has lied about a search warrant to save the man's daughter
GuestStars: Katie Barrett, Tom McCarthy, Valentina DeAngelis, Patrick Stump, Tim Kelleher, Marisa Ryan, Michael Willis, Jon Krupp, Brad Calcaterra, Paula Leggett Chase, Gerritt Vandermeer, Caralyn Kozlowski, Martin Shakar, J
